Full job description
Schools Plus Ltd hires out schools facilities when the school day is over.

As a Venue Supervisor you will work shifts and take ownership of the events taking place.

PEOPLE SKILLS: This is a great job for someone who loves meeting people. You must be confident, friendly and amenable with all our customers. Attention to detail and thoroughness are essential - both our customers and the School expect a high quality service. Our staff form great relationships with our regular customers.

RESPONSIBILITY: You will be given full training in all aspects of the job. You must have common sense and be able to use your initiative to solve problems and deal with emergencies as and when they arise. You will often be working on your own, taking responsibility for the smooth running of the site and the well-being of everyone there. Your Team Leader and Venue Manager are available to support you.

This position will suit a person who is punctual and well organised, who thrives when given real responsibility and independence.

Tasks will include:

Opening up the site, preparing rooms, locking up the site at the end of the shift
Interacting with our customers: signing them in, providing assistance, making sure they are using their allocated rooms, etc.
Cleaning up after activities and returning rooms as the school would expect to find them.
FLEXIBILITY WITH SECURITY: The hours we can offer will depend on your availability and the changing needs at the schools but please be aware that shifts take place in the evenings, weekends and during school holidays as well as during the school day.

You can decide how many hours you are available over the coming weeks, and confirm your rota with your manager. Once we’ve both committed to the rota, we will honour it, even if the bookings get cancelled for some reason. We expect you to do the same.

BE PART OF A TEAM: You will not only be part of the team at your sites, you will also be welcomed into the Schools Plus family. We’ve been managing lettings for 17 years and we have a terrific support network.

OPPORTUNITY: Many of our Venue Supervisors have gone on to other roles within the company, including Team Leaders, Venue Managers and even the HR & Compliance Director. 84% of our Team Leaders have progressed from Venue Supervisor!

There are always opportunities to develop your career, if that’s what you’re looking for.

Due to the lone working nature of this position and the supervision of customers, applicants must be over the age of 18.

We are committed to the highest standards of child protection. We rigorously vet all candidates, including police checks. All employees are subject to ongoing monitoring for child protection purposes.

Schools Plus is an Equal Opportunities employer, and we welcome your application.

Job Types: Part-time, Permanent

Pay: £12.39 per hour

Expected hours: 10 – 15 per week

Benefits:

Cycle to work scheme
Referral programme
Work Location: In person
